title: Aníbal Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: Aníbal Domingo Fernández (born January 9, 1957) is an Argentine Justicialist Party politician, lawyer, and certified public accountant. Throughout his career, he has remained a close ally to the former Presidents Néstor Kirchner and Cristina Fernández de Kirchner.

title: Aníbal Fernández | AS/COA
snippet: Previously, he served in the National Senate as representative for the province of Buenos Aires. Fernández initiated his career as consultant to the Budget Committee for the Senators Chambers of the province of Buenos Aires in 1983.

title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: Aníbal Fernández started his political journey early, joining the Peronist movement. He began working in public service in 1983. He worked for the cities of Quilmes and Florencio Varela.

title: Buenos Aires Times | Aníbal Fernández: ‘I understand and share the president’s view on re-election’
snippet: Security Minister Aníbal Fernández, who has won the confidence of both Alberto Fernández and Cristina Fernández de Krichner in his lengthy political career occupying posts of key importance in different Peronist governments, gave an interview ...

title: Aníbal Fernández (Politician) - Age, Birthday, Bio, Facts, Family, Net Worth, Height & More | AllFamous.org
snippet: Aníbal Domingo Fernández is a politician, lawyer and accountant for the Justice Party of Argentina, a close ally of former presidents Néstor Kirchner and Cristina Fernández de Kirchner.
